content: made treble_crochet in top of st from row 2 ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made double_crochet in first chain space of row 1 this will be the ​ beg chain from row 1 ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made skip next 3 chain space / st from row 1 double_crochet ​ in next st ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made skip next 2 chain space / st double_crochet in next chain space / st ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made treble_crochet in top of st from row 2 ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made double_crochet in top of st from row 5 ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made double_crochet in top of st from row 7 ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made double_crochet in top of st from row 9 ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made skip chain skip next 2sts double_crochet in next st ch5 treble_crochet in top of last st made join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain from beg this will be the same space the treble_crochet was stitched in ​ ​ round 10>> round 11>> ​ ​ ​ round 11 slip_stitch into next chain space ch3 7dc in same space *ch3 half_double_crochet in next chain space ch3 8dc in next chain space repeat from * around ending with a ch3 join with slip_stitch into top of beg chain round 12 ch6 single_crochet in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet in next st ch3 single_crochet in top of last st made 2 times double_crochet in next st ch3 double_crochet in top of last st twice single_crochet in top of last double_crochet made in round 11 double_crochet in next st ch3 single_crochet in top of last st made double_crochet in next st 3 times * ch2 skip next 2-ch3 and half_double_crochet double_crochet in next st ch3 single_crochet in top of last st made 3times double_crochet in next st ch3 double_crochet in top of last st twice single_crochet in top of last double_crochet made in round 11 double_crochet in next st ch3 single_crochet in top of last st made double_crochet in next st 3 times repeat from * around join with slip_stitch into top of beg chain under picot 4 round 13 ch1 skip beg chain bpdc around next double_crochet under picot see photo a ch3 bpdc around next ​ ​ ​ double_crochet 6 times * skip next double_crochet / picot bpdc around next double_crochet ch3 bpdc around next double_crochet 6 times repeat from * around ending with a slip_stitch into top of first bpdc 36 chain sps ​ round 14 slip_stitch into next chain space ch3 double_crochet in same space ch3 single_crochet in top of last st made 2dc ch3 single_crochet in top of last st made in each of next 35 chain sps join with a slip_stitch into top of beg chain fasten off https //www facebook com/wanamakerart/ ref=bookmarks https //www etsy com/shop/creativeworkbyannie ref=pr_shop_more https //www ravelry
